alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Bighorn Canyon; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Rosebud; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 9:43PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND SHOWERS WILL IMPACT EASTERN STILLWATER...WESTERN BIG HORN... CENTRAL CARBON...CENTRAL MUSSELSHELL...YELLOWSTONE...SOUTHEASTERN GOLDEN VALLEY...NORTHERN ROSEBUD AND TREASURE COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM MST... At 942 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty winds and showers along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Melstone to 12 miles northwest of Red Lodge. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Hardin, Columbus, Roundup, Hysham, Custer, Laurel, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Melstone, Lockwood, Worden, Fort Smith, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, and Absarokee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Drivers should be prepared for sudden strong crosswinds.
